about_the_game:
BOLO Legends - Haloween Special is three stage demo, with moderate difficulty. watch out for magic water, crabs, Spiked turtles, Little Dino, Witches, Bombs, and other elements that might hurt BOLO, cause he is the last hope for princess this Haloween.

Features -
moderate difficulty
All super Powers
Fun and fast navigation
Haloween Theme

Conclusion -
it is like a mini game of the original game and its filled with characters and witches throughout the DEMO
detailed_description:
BOLO Legends - Haloween Special is three stage demo, with moderate difficulty. watch out for magic water, crabs, Spiked turtles, Little Dino, Witches, Bombs, and other elements that might hurt BOLO, cause he is the last hope for princess this Haloween.

Features -
moderate difficulty
All super Powers
Fun and fast navigation
Haloween Theme

Conclusion -
it is like a mini game of the original game and its filled with characters and witches throughout the DEMO
name: BOLO Legends - An Epic Adventure Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home Edition - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 - 4370
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home Edition - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 6700 or AMD Ryzen 5 3500x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti or AMD RX Vega-56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: BOLO Legends - Haloween Special is Haloween Demo. Its fun and very engaging game and display of all the abilities that will be in original game. Dont worry original game will have a more refined gameplay and lots of puzzle and adventure.
